summary: After Suman's father leaves her in the care of another family while he travels abroad, she falls in love with Prem. However, in order to for them to marry, Prem has to prove to Suman's father that he is not the same as his own dad.
cast: Salman Khan|Bhagyashree|Alok Nath|Rajeev Verma|Reema Lagoo|Ajit Vachani|Harish Patel|Deep Dhillon|Huma Khan|Handsome|Pervin Dastur|Shreechand Makhija|Rakesh Shrivastav|Dilip Joshi|Sushil Johri|Sunil Nanda|Nandlal Jaiswal|Master Bhagwan|Purnendu Shekhar|Raju Srivastava|Bala Dhingra|Mohan Srivastava|Chhaya|Master Pratik|Mohnish Bahl|Laxmikant Berde|Naushaad Abbas|Leela Aviet|Shirley
title: Maine Pyar Kiya
